result.title: Front-end Software Engineer (Contract)
result.description:
Responsibilities
We are looking for a front-end software engineer to work on our analytics dashboard and creative workflow for content operations to optimize books for our readers and allow better discovery. In this role you will:

1. Work closely with user acquisition team on understanding the performance dashboard and iterate over improvements on front-end
2. Design and implement single-page applications to enable content to creative campaign workflow
3. Work with designers to improve UX for the content operation tool
4. Develop modules for encoding audio/video assets on web UI for our content discovery

Qualifications
1. BA/BS degree in Computer Science or related field
2. Familiar with CMS system, have used WordPress or similar systems
3. Hands-on with React.js, Redux, npm
4. Knowledge of web technologies related to audio/video media
5. Knowledge of AWS, Google Cloud or Azure as cloud technologies
